comment.author: 17967810@N00
comment._content: From the worn look these were in use long before the picture. My grandmother's utensils, beautiful!

comment.author: 10213344@N07
comment._content: Basic seasonings and well used utensils, so its not how much you have but how you use it. I can imagine that what came from this kitchen years ago was fresh, and flavorful.
